body.p: Corejava is part of the CZT project that aims at providing a framework for building formal methods tools, especially for the Z specification language. This subproject provides AST (Annotated Syntax Tree) classes for Z written in Java.

If you are a Z user and you are looking for existing Z tools, you might be more interested in other, more user oriented subprojects of CZT (which often use the classes provided here). If you are a developer of Z tools, this might be exactly what you are looking for.

ul.li: AST interfaces and classes for standard Z (extensions for Object Z and TCOZ are under development)
Support for the visitor design pattern that allows tools to traverse the AST
